Title: Orchard.SampleSite
Description: Example of a real world orchard cms site demonstrating theme development, custom modules and types.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Example of a real world orchard cms site demonstrating theme development, custom modules and types.

This project is accompanied by a series of blog posts starting here: http://www.deepcode.co.uk/2011/05/real-world-orchard-cms-introduction.html

Index to accompanying blog posts

Note that in source control, each part has it's own corresponding folder
  • Part 1 - introduction - http://www.deepcode.co.uk/2011/05/real-world-orchard-cms-introduction.html
  • Part 2 - theme - http://www.deepcode.co.uk/2011/05/real-world-orchard-cms-part-2-creating.html
  • Part 3 - twitter widget - http://www.deepcode.co.uk/2011/05/real-world-orchard-cms-part-3-creating.html
  • Part 4 - more advanced theme topics - http://www.deepcode.co.uk/2011/05/real-world-orchard-cms-part-4-cleaning.html
  • Part 5 - caching (more on the twitter widget) - http://www.deepcode.co.uk/2011/05/real-world-orchard-cms-part-5-caching.html
  • Part 6 - custom content types and parts - http://www.deepcode.co.uk/2011/05/real-world-orchard-cmspart-6custom.html
  • Part 7 - find and querying content - a related content widget - http://www.deepcode.co.uk/2011/06/real-world-orchard-cmspart-7finding.html
  • Part 8 - navigation - creating a sub-navigation widget - coming soon
  • Part 9 - custom layer rules - coming soon
  • Part 10 - AJAX rendering shapes - starting a shopping basket - coming soon
  • Part 11 - custom controllers - completing the shopping basket - coming soon
  • Part 12 - forms - building a register your interest form - coming soon
  • Part 13+ - I'm open to suggestions....

If you want to know when each part is published, follow me (@deepcodecouk) on twitter.
